comments: She\'s super nice! Doesn\'t speak English well, but if you are a friendly person she will like you and even help you on assessments. She\'s pretty lenient but don\'t take that for granted bc we do a lot online & there\'s only so much wiggle room in regards to that. I have enjoyed her class so much! I\'m not a language person so I really had to study hard

Took Italian 3 with her at Duke. By far the best Italian teacher here. She\'s really funny and easy. She doesn\'t speak english well but it doesn\'t matter she\'s amazing. If you have a choice definitely take Italian with her.

Very sweet and really loves her students. She doesn\'t speak english well so understanding her is sometimes a problem, but the message always comes through. Laughs at everything and only gets frustrated if you really don\'t pay attention. I learned a lot of Italian, but it depends how much work you put into it.
She\'s a really easy grader, but kind of hard to understand sometimes, her english is not that good. I would definately take another class with her
